snippet.title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
🏁 Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is now available on Early Unlock! Play now by getting the Gold Edition: https://linktr.ee/tdusolarcrown
 
Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is a lifestyle and social experience that redefines the standards of open-world racing games. Alone or with friends, explore the island of Hong Kong,  accurately reproduced at 1:1 scale. Collect exceptional cars from dealerships, customize them in workshops, and showcase your style to reach the elite of the competition.
 
Pre-order now and experience the ultimate racing & lifestyle experience on September 12, 2024 for the official launch, on PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S.

-------------------------------

For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter/X ► https://twitter.com/Nacon
TikTok ► https://tiktok.com/@nacon
